nodes.bodyText:
Is it possible to update this automatically as part of release pipeline?
/cc @radtriste

We could at least create a PR but no automatic merging for sure

nodes.bodyText:
we should use placeholder instead of our username

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              image: quay.io/jrota/dmn-tracing-quarkus:1.0.0-snapshot # <---- replace with your image
          
          
            
              image: quay.io/<YOUR_NAMESPACE>/dmn-tracing-quarkus:1.0.0-snapshot # <---- replace with your image
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,16 +1,23 @@
+apiVersion: v1
+kind: ConfigMap
+metadata:
+  name: dmn-tracing-quarkus-config
+data:
+  application.properties: |
+    kafka.bootstrap.servers=my-cluster-kafka-bootstrap:9092
+---
 apiVersion: app.kiegroup.org/v1alpha1
 kind: KogitoRuntime
 metadata:
   name: dmn-tracing-quarkus
+  labels:
+    app: dmn-tracing-quarkus
 spec:
   replicas: 1
-  image:
-    domain: quay.io           # <---- replace with the hub you used for the dmn-tracing-quarkus image
-    namespace: jrota          # <---- replace with your namespace/username 
-    name: dmn-tracing-quarkus
-    tag: 1.0.0-snapshot       # <---- replace with the tag you used
-  kafka:
-    externalURI: my-cluster-kafka-bootstrap:9092 
-  envs:
+  image: quay.io/jrota/dmn-tracing-quarkus:1.0.0-snapshot # <---- replace with your image
